about_the_game:
Creatures of utter horror and the darkest of nightmares! Apocalypse is an album composed by Richard John S that focuses on darkness and atmosphere. The compositions in this music pack will work well with horror and suspenseful scenes, dungeons, and post-apocalyptic scenarios. Each composition has both fade out and looped versions (please read loop instructions for more details).

Features:

- 15 dark and atmospheric BGM tracks for your RPG Maker MV game projects.
- Music for horror and suspenseful scenes, dungeons, and post-apocalyptic scenarios.
- Each track contains both fade out and looped versions (please read loop instructions for more details).
- .m4a, .mp3 and .ogg file formats are included.
- Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Tracklist:

01 - Apocalypse
02 - Catacombs of Terror
03 - Chaos
04 - Darkness
05 - Demonic Presence
06 - Forgotten Cemetery
07 - Haunted
08 - Nightmare
09 - Omen
10 - Phantoms
11 - Sanctuary of the Damned
12 - The Abyss
13 - The Brood Mother
14 - Twilight
15 - Unforsaken

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Apocalypse Music Pack

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution
